resources.string: Kobe and its employees are not responsible for any damages that arise from thrown phones. By clicking \"accept\", the user agrees that if they throw their phone, it is their choice and their choice alone.
QUEST: airtime > .5 seconds, phone landing face-up
QUEST: airtime > .5 seconds, phone landing face-down
QUEST: airtime > .5 seconds, phone landing face-down
